class.name: franka_ros_controllers/JointPositionController
class.description: Controller for commanding absolute joint positions of the Franka arm

class.name: franka_ros_controllers/EffortJointPositionController
class.description: Controller for commanding joint position of the Franka arm using effort control (torque)

class.name: franka_ros_controllers/JointTorqueController
class.description: Controller for commanding joint torques of the Franka arm directly

class.name: franka_ros_controllers/JointVelocityController
class.description: Controller for commanding joint velocity of the Franka arm using internal joint velocity controller

class.name: franka_ros_controllers/JointImpedanceController
class.description: Controller for commanding joint impedances to be exerted by the Franka Arm

class.name: franka_ros_controllers/CartesianPoseController
class.description: Controller for commanding cartesian poses to be exerted by the Franka Arm

class.name: franka_ros_controllers/CartesianVelocitiesController
class.description: Controller for commanding cartesian velocities to be exerted by the Franka Arm

class.name: franka_ros_controllers/CartesianImpedanceController
class.description: Controller for commanding cartesian impedances to be exerted by the Franka Arm

class.name: franka_ros_controllers/ForceController
class.description: Controller for commanding 6D forces to be exerted by the Franka Arm
